title: All the club activities happen after 4pm? How long do you guys stay back, till 6-7pm? I am opting for college bus, so I will have to leave early, but I don't want to miss out on opportunities

comments.body: All club activities usually happen after college hours. If you are willing to participate, you need to plan your transport accordingly.

Bruh yav its after college timings? I wanted to opt for college bus but that goes after 5pm.
